snippet: Armenia said it was suspending diplomatic relations with Hungary on Friday because Hungary had allowed a soldier from Azerbaijan who killed an Armenian officer in 2004 to return home.
abstract: Armenia suspends diplomatic relations with Hungary because Hungary allowed a soldier from Azerbaijan who killed an Armenian officer in 2004 to return home, where he was immediately pardoned and freed.
lead_paragraph: Armenia said it was suspending diplomatic relations with Hungary on Friday because Hungary had allowed a soldier from Azerbaijan who killed an Armenian officer in 2004 to return home.

headline.seo: Dispute Darkens Armenian Relations With Hungary
headline.main: Armenia: Dispute Darkens Relations With Hungary
headline.print_headline: Armenia: Dispute Darkens Relations With Hungary
